title: raama namoralinchara
sahitya:
rAma nA morAlincarA raghuvara samayamidE

caraNam 1

 rAra ninu nammiti gadarA sarasijAkSa sanaka 
sanandana mukha vandita pada parAtpara parAkEla
 
caraNam 2

 pAmara janAvana sanAtana sarvOttama sAragu nIpada pankajamula viTanA 
        viTa nATakanika karuNan karuNAkara sadA shubhakara nanu maravaka 
 
caraNam 3

 nI mahimalE neruga lEkanati durmatinai su-krtambula nEranu karivaradA 
        bhaya kara kamala kamalAptakula candra puruSOttama dasharatha
 
caraNam 4

 manavini vinara sadA maracite veratugadA manasulEda moravinadAshrita 
        phaladAyaka birudA nenaruncara nI pada bhakti nosagumikanu vinanE
        nirantarAparAdhiyau durAmadini carALamuga
 
caraNam 5

 nI mahima neruga nannAdaramagu naTarA naTarAja hrdambuja 
        vara madhukara nikhilAtmakanE satatamu rAmapura guruvarayanucuna
        patilamugA pogaDucunu narAvatArA raghu
